results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{k>=0} 1/2^(k!).
formula: Equals A092874 plus 0.5. [_R. J. Mathar_, Sep 08 2008]
mathematica: digits = 105; NSum[ 1/2^k!, {k, 0, 12} , WorkingPrecision -> digits] // RealDigits[#, 10, digits]& // First (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 04 2013 *)
